     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17706821">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17706821">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17706821">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951112">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951112" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17706823">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17706823">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17706823">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17706823">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17706823" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17706824">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17706824">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17706824">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find authoritative introductions to my paper topic, with recommended resources for further research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17706824">
          <div id="boxatt17706824" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20803628">
              <a id="link_20803628" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20803628,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20803629">
              <a id="link_20803629" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20803629,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12402162}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Newly revised and online, well-respected resource complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20803630">
              <a id="link_20803630" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/1,1,2,B/frameset&amp;FF=tencyclopedia+of+mexico+history+society+and+culture&amp;2,,2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20803630,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20077376}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Mexico
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Signed articles written by leading scholars in the field. Great for topic narrowing and for identifying the most important articles and books on a subject.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20807026">
              <a id="link_20807026" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discoveryoclc/79423156" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20807026,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716971}); ">
               International Encyclopedia of Dance
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Nearly 2,000 articles written by scholars from fifty countries, the Encyclopedia covers the full spectrum of dance--theatrical, ritual, dance-drama, folk, traditional, ethnic, and social dance. Cultural and national overviews are accompanied by entries on dance forms, music and costumes, performances, and biographies of dancers and choreographers.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17706825">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17706825">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17706825">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17706825">
          <div id="boxatt17706825" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20803632">
              <a id="link_20803632" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20803632,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25284389">
              <a id="link_25284389" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25284389,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20702553}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many authors have placed their works in Google Books as a way to increase exposure and hopefully sell more copies of their works.  Any full text that appears may not be easy to extract or manipulate, and often only snippets are available for viewing online. Use the "Find in a Library" option to "request item" on interlibrary loan (you need to be "connected to the Muhlenberg Col Libr network" to do so).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17706826">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17706826">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17706826">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate peer-reviewed (scholarly) journal articles?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17706826">
          <div id="boxatt17706826" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20807065">
              <a id="link_20807065" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20807065,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20807253">
              <a id="link_20807253" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20807253,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25284388">
              <a id="link_25284388" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25284388,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20803633">
              <a id="link_20803633" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20803633,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical research about Latin America and Spain. English and Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20803634">
              <a id="link_20803634" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20803634,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Interdisciplinary scholarly journals. English and Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20807244">
              <a id="link_20807244" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20807244,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717120}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20807182">
              <a id="link_20807182" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20807182,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American History and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715745}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly and popular literature in musicology, ethnomusicology, dance, and other music-related disciplines, with many links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4796628" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17706827">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17706827">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17706827">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17706827">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17706827" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17706828">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17706828">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17706828">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951119">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951119" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
